Test Description: Verify that user can successfully login with valid email and password
Preconditions: User has valid credentials registered in the system
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to login page
2. Enter valid email in username field
3. Click Continue button
4. Enter valid password in password field
5. Click Continue button
Expected Result:
1. User is redirected to home page (https://app-staging.vivacityapp.com/demo-student)
2. Login is successful
3. User dashboard is displayed

Test Description: Verify that system shows error message when user enters invalid email format
Preconditions: User is on the login page
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to login page
2. Enter invalid email format in username field (e.g., 'kcvivacity' without @)
3. Click Continue button
Expected Result:
1. Error message 'Email is not valid.' is displayed
2. User remains on the login page
3. Continue button is disabled or validation prevents submission

Test Description: Verify that system validates empty email field
Preconditions: User is on the login page
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to login page
2. Leave email field empty
3. Click Continue button
Expected Result:
1. Error message is displayed indicating email is required
2. User cannot proceed to password field
3. User remains on email input page

Test Description: Verify that system shows error for incorrect password
Preconditions: User has valid email but enters wrong password
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to login page
2. Enter valid email
3. Click Continue
4. Enter incorrect password
5. Click Continue
Expected Result:
1. Error message is displayed (e.g., 'Wrong email or password')
2. User remains on login page
3. Login fails

Test Description: Verify that system validates empty password field
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to login page
2. Enter valid email and proceed
3. Leave password field empty
4. Click Continue
Expected Result:
1. Error message is displayed indicating password is required
2. User cannot proceed
3. User remains on password input page

Test Case Name: Login with SQL Injection in Email
Test Description: Verify that system is protected against SQL injection attacks
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to login page
2. Enter SQL injection string in email field
3. Click Continue
Expected Result:
1. System rejects the input or sanitizes it
2. No SQL injection vulnerability
3. Appropriate error message or validation

Test Case Name: Login with Special Characters in Password
Test Description: Verify that user can login with password containing special characters
Preconditions: User has password with special characters
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to login page
2. Enter valid email
3. Click Continue
4. Enter password with special characters
5. Click Continue
Expected Result:
1. Login is successful if credentials are correct
2. Special characters are accepted
3. User is redirected to dashboard

Test Description: Verify that login session expires after period of inactivity
Test Steps:
1. Login successfully
2. Leave the application idle for session timeout period (e.g., 30 minutes)
3. Attempt to perform any action
Expected Result:
1. Session expires
2. User is redirected to login page
3. Message indicates session timeout

Test Description: Verify that 'Remember Me' checkbox works correctly
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to login page
2. Enter valid credentials
3. Check 'Remember Me' checkbox
4. Login successfully
5. Close browser
6. Reopen browser and navigate to application
Expected Result:
1. User remains logged in after reopening browser
2. User is not required to enter credentials again
3. Session is maintained

Test Description: Verify that user can successfully logout
Test Steps:
1. Login successfully
2. Navigate to user menu
3. Click Logout button
4. Confirm logout if required
Expected Result:
1. User is logged out
2. User is redirected to login page
3. Session is cleared
4. Back button should not allow access to logged-in pages

Test Description: Verify error message when using unregistered email
Preconditions: User enters email that doesn't exist in system
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to login page
2. Enter unregistered email
3. Click Continue
4. Enter any password
5. Click Continue
Expected Result:
1. Error message is displayed (e.g., 'Wrong email or password')
2. Login fails
3. User remains on login page

Test Description: Verify that password visibility toggle works correctly
Preconditions: User is on password input field
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to login page
2. Proceed to password field
3. Enter password
4. Click on show/hide password icon
5. Verify password visibility
Expected Result:
1. Password is shown as dots/asterisks by default
2. Clicking eye icon shows password in plain text
3. Clicking again hides the password

Test Description: Verify account lockout after multiple failed login attempts
Preconditions: User attempts to login multiple times with wrong password
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to login page
2. Enter valid email
3. Enter wrong password
4. Repeat steps 2-3 for 5 times
Expected Result:
1. After X failed attempts account is locked
2. Error message indicates account lockout
3. User cannot login even with correct password until lockout expires or is reset

Test Description: Verify that email field is case-insensitive
Preconditions: User enters email with different case variations
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to login page
2. Enter email with uppercase letters (e.g., KC@VIVACITYAPP.COM)
3. Proceed to password
4. Enter correct password
5. Click Continue
Expected Result:
1. System treats email as case-insensitive
2. Login is successful
3. User is redirected to dashboard

Test Description: Verify that forgot password link works correctly
Preconditions: User clicks on forgot password link
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to login page
2. Click on 'Forgot Password' link
3. Enter registered email
4. Submit request
Expected Result:
1. User is redirected to password reset page
2. Password reset email is sent
3. Confirmation message is displayed
